intro: Lasianthus lancilobus, commonly known as the slender-lobed lasianthus, is a flowering plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family. It is native to Southeast Asia, including countries like Thailand and Malaysia. The plant is characterized by its slender, lance-shaped leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Lasianthus lancilobus is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
